plants.name: cactus
plants.description: Desert plant that has thick, leafless stems covered in prickly spines or sharp spikes.

plants.name: fiddle-leaf fig
plants.description: Has a tropical look with lyre-shaped leaves.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.description: Not just a pretty face, though — he’s also super easy to care for, as long as you keep an eye on his light levels and the right amount of watering.
